statements: SELECT * FROM dance_studio_membership;
SELECT member_name, contact_details FROM dance_studio_membership;
SELECT member_id, membership_status FROM dance_studio_membership WHERE membership_status='Active';
SELECT * FROM dance_studio_membership WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM dance_studio_membership ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dance_studio_membership WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, contact_details FROM dance_studio_membership WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM dance_studio_membership ORDER BY member_name DESC;
SELECT member_id, member_name FROM dance_studio_membership WHERE member_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT COUNT(member_id) AS total_members, membership_status FROM dance_studio_membership GROUP BY membership_status HAVING membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM dance_studio_members;
SELECT member_name, contact_details FROM dance_studio_members;
SELECT * FROM dance_studio_members WHERE membership_status='Active';
SELECT member_id, member_name, contact_details FROM dance_studio_members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT member_id, payment_date, amount FROM membership_payments WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM dance_studio_members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT member_name, contact_details FROM dance_studio_members WHERE membership_status = 'Active' ORDER BY member_name ASC;

SELECT member_name, payment_date, amount FROM dance_studio_members JOIN membership_payments ON dance_studio_members.member_id = membership_payments.member_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;

SELECT member_id, member_name, payment_date, amount FROM dance_studio_members LEFT JOIN membership_payments ON dance_studio_members.member_id = membership_payments.member_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';

SELECT member_id, member_name, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM dance_studio_members JOIN membership_payments ON dance_studio_members.member_id = membership_payments.member_id GROUP BY member_id HAVING total_payments > 500;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT member_name, email FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT member_name, contact_number FROM members ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE max_capacity > 20;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM classes WHERE instructor_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE member_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, email FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM classes WHERE max_capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT member_name, class_name, enrollment_date FROM members JOIN enrollment ON members.member_id = enrollment.member_id JOIN classes ON enrollment.class_id = classes.class_id;
SELECT class_name, instructor_name FROM classes WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT member_name, email FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT class_name, instructor, schedule FROM classes WHERE location = 'Gym';
SELECT * FROM registrations ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT member_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT member_name, contact_number FROM members WHERE contact_number LIKE '+1%';
SELECT class_name, instructor, schedule FROM classes ORDER BY schedule DESC;
SELECT member_name, class_name, registration_date FROM members JOIN registrations ON members.member_id = registrations.member_id WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT member_name, amount, payment_date FROM members JOIN payments ON members.member_id = payments.member_id WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM members;
SELECT name, email, membership_status FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT class_name, instructor, start_time, end_time FROM classes WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT member_id, name, phone_number FROM members ORDER BY member_id DESC;
SELECT instructor_name, expertise FROM instructors WHERE expertise LIKE '%Yoga%' ORDER BY instructor_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM members WHERE membership_status = 'Active';
SELECT name, email FROM members ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT class_name, instructor FROM classes WHERE start_time > '2022-01-01' AND end_time < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM attendance JOIN members ON attendance.member_id = members.member_id WHERE members.name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT instructor_name, expertise FROM instructors ORDER BY expertise DESC, instructor_name ASC;
